cyclone.name: IRMA
cyclone.trajectory: Moving west to west-northwest across the northern Leeward Islands tonight, then forecast to pass near or over the Bahamas and approach south Florida late Saturday/Sunday
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Leeward Islands tonight; potential second landfall south Florida or Florida Keys

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch: Guadeloupe; Dominican Republic from Cabo Engano to Haiti border; Haiti northern coast; Turks & Caicos; Southeastern Bahamas
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning: Northern Leeward Islands, U.S. & British Virgin Islands, Puerto Rico.  Tropical-Storm Warning: Guadeloupe, Dominica
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Leeward Islands, Virgin Islands, Puerto Rico, Hispaniola north coast, Turks & Caicos, Bahamas, south Florida
